text: Elias Hrawi (, 4 September 1926 â€“ 7 July 2006) was a Lebanese politician. He was the President of Lebanon from 1989 to 1998. Hrawi died of cancer at the American University Hospital in Beirut on 7 July 2006, aged 79. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Presidents of Lebanon Category:Lebanese businesspeople Category:Asian lawyers
